coreOffering.whatItDoes: Glendor PHI Sanitizer is software that automatically redacts Protected Health Information (PHI) from multimodal medical data including medical images (pixels and metadata), pathology, reports, videos, photos, and voice recordings.
coreOffering.problemSolved: Healthcare organizations need to share medical data for research, AI training, and collaboration, but manually de-identifying PHI is non-scalable, time-consuming, and risky. Current alternatives (manual redaction, templates, 3rd party cloud services) are either labor-intensive, fragile, or expose unredacted data to external parties.
coreOffering.howItWorks: Fully automatic in situ (on-premise/customer cloud) redaction that processes medical data at the source without requiring templates, manual intervention, or sending data to third parties. Designed to integrate as a node into existing data workflows or operate as a standalone tool.

targetAudience.idealCustomer: Healthcare organizations that need to share, aggregate, or use medical data externally while maintaining HIPAA compliance and patient privacy
painPoints: Non-scalable manual de-identification processes requiring trained technicians
Template-based solutions that break when hardware/software settings change
Risk exposure when sending unredacted data to third-party cloud services (Google, Amazon)
Need for BAAs (Business Associate Agreements) with de-identification vendors
Inability to handle unknown or varied medical data formats
Time and cost of preparing medical data for research and AI training

features.name: Fully Automatic Processing
features.description: Does not require tuning, templates, or manual intervention to redact PHI
features.benefit: Eliminates labor costs and bottlenecks of manual de-identification; scales without adding staff

features.name: At-Source/In Situ Processing
features.description: Medical data is sanitized on customer premises or customer cloud; data is never shared with any third party including Glendor
features.benefit: Eliminates exposure risk and privacy concerns; no need to trust third parties with sensitive patient data

features.name: Multi-Modality Support
features.description: Handles medical images, pathology, reports, videos, photos, and audio recordings
features.benefit: Single solution for all medical data types rather than multiple point solutions

features.name: Multiple Format Support
features.description: Processes various medical data formats across different modalities
features.benefit: Works with diverse data sources without custom configuration

features.name: Easy Integration
features.description: 1 minute to install and start running; designed to integrate as a node into existing data workflows
features.benefit: Minimal IT overhead and fast time-to-value; fits into existing infrastructure

features.name: No BAA Required
features.description: Because data never leaves customer premises, no Business Associate Agreement is needed with Glendor
features.benefit: Simplified procurement, reduced legal overhead, faster deployment

features.name: Pixel and Metadata Redaction
features.description: Redacts PHI from both the visual content (pixels) and embedded metadata in medical images
features.benefit: Complete de-identification that catches PHI often missed by visual-only solutions

features.name: Standalone or Integrated Operation
features.description: Can be used as a standalone tool or integrated as a workflow node
features.benefit: Flexibility to fit different organizational needs and technical architectures

valueProposition.mainUvp: Fully automatic, at-source PHI de-identification that keeps medical data on your premises—no exposure to third parties, no templates, no manual work.
differentiators: Data never leaves customer network (vs. Google Cloud Healthcare API, Amazon Rekognition)
Fully automatic without templates (vs. template-based solutions that break with any deviation)
No BAA required (vs. third-party services requiring legal agreements)
Works with unknown/varied medical data (vs. rigid template systems)
Multi-modal in single solution (images, video, audio, documents)
sellingPoints: Founded by specialists in NLP, Machine Learning, Speech Recognition, OCR, and Image Processing
Enables clinical research and AI advancement while protecting privacy

awards: 2025 Digital Health Hub Foundation Digital Health Awards Quarterfinalist (Mental and Behavioral Health Track - Rising Star Category) - selected from 1800 companies
HIMSS25 Emerge Innovation Experience Contest Winner's Circle (Category: Payer – Improving data & analytics capabilities and reach)
publications: 2023 Industry Perceptions Survey on AI Adoption and Return on Investment - Journal of Digital Imaging (2024)
Special Challenges of Sensitive Images: A HIMSS-SIIM Enterprise Imaging Community Whitepaper - Journal of Digital Imaging (2024)
companyCredentials: Founded by specialists in NLP, Machine Learning, Speech Recognition, OCR, and Image Processing

toneAndVoice.style: Professional, technical, healthcare-industry focused with emphasis on compliance and security. Confident but not aggressive. Uses comparison format to highlight superiority over alternatives.
notablePhrases: On a quest to safeguard patients' privacy
Data is sanitized on customer premises
1 min to install and start running
Not shared with any 3rd party (including Glendor)

callsToAction.primary: Join us for a live demo
secondary: Get in touch (contact form with Name, Email, Message fields)
Visit booth at SIIM 2025 Annual Meeting

useCases: Use Case 1: Data Leaving Customer's Network (sharing medical data externally)
Use Case 2: Data Entering Customer's Network (receiving/ingesting external medical data)

templates: Requires new template for each hardware/software change
Does not work with unknown data
